alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:28PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Columbia County through 200 PM PDT... At 128 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Delaney, or 14 miles north of Dayton, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Starbuck and Delaney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
